description: A React hook named usePolling that periodically invokes an asynchronous fetch function and calls a callback with the results or errors.

methods.name: usePolling(fetchFn, { interval = 2000, enabled = true, onUpdate } = {})
methods.description: A hook that polls an async fetch function at a specified interval and invokes onUpdate callback with the fetched data or error.

ctags.name: usePolling
ctags.pattern: /^export function usePolling(fetchFn, { interval = 2000, enabled = true, onUpdate } = {}) {$/
